title: Senate Dems help GOP advance immigrant crime law, the Laken Riley Act
shortDescription: The bill has been panned by immigration advocates but received the support from several swing state senators.

title: Will there be a second Trump resistance?
shortDescription: The Women's March and Indivisible say there will be a resistance, but for the 92% of Black women who voted for Harris it may be too late.

title: How are you feeling about the transition from Biden to Trump? Tell us
shortDescription: Have thoughts on the presidential transition and what it means for you over the next four years? We want to hear from you.

title: Trump's inaugural ceremony moved indoors due to intense cold forecast
shortDescription: "There is an Arctic blast sweeping the country. I don't want to see people hurt, or injured in any way."

title: Lt. Gov. Jon Husted expected to fill JD Vance's Ohio Senate seat
shortDescription: The anticipated appointment will end weeks of speculation about who will join newly minted Sen. Bernie Moreno in Washington.

title: President Biden commutes 2,500 drug offenses
shortDescription: The outgoing president commuted 2,5000 drug offenses he described as "disproportionately long."

title: Here are the foreign leaders coming to Donald Trump's inauguration
shortDescription: Argentine President Javier Milei's attendance is historically significant. No serving foreign leader has ever attended a U.S. presidential inauguration.

title: Biden won't enforce looming TikTok ban, punting decision to Trump
shortDescription: President Biden will not enforce a ban on TikTok that is set to take effect Sunday, a U.S. official said, leaving its fate to Donald Trump.

title: Trump talks TikTok and more with China's Xi Jinping as U.S. ban looms
shortDescription: Trump has said he has a "warm spot" for the app, a distinct change of heart after his first administration first called for a ban on TikTok.

title: No Trump post about Staten Island joining New Jersey | Fact check
shortDescription: The post in the video is a fabrication. It does not appear on Trump’s X account, and no credible news reports support the claim.

title: Supreme Court upholds law that could ban TikTok for 170 million Americans
shortDescription: In an unsigned opinion, the Court sided with the national security concerns about TikTok rather than the First Amendment rights. There were no noted dissents.

title: State senator arrested inside Georgia capitol
shortDescription: State Sen. Colton Moore was arrested inside the Georgia Capitol for trying to enter the House chamber after being banned.

title: Kristi Noem confirmation hearing recap: How she handled Senate queries
shortDescription: Noem and committee Republicans focused on the border while Democrats asked about foreign and home-grown terrorism during a cordial hearing.

title: Trump's top administration picks reflect broad geographic diversity
shortDescription: A USA TODAY review of almost 100 of the administration's top hires shows nearly half of states could have a representative in the second Trump term.

title: Biden commutes 2,500 drug sentences in final days of presidency
shortDescription: 'With this action, I have now issued more individual pardons and commutations than any president in U.S. history,' Biden noted in a statement.

title: Trump proposes 'major pardons' for Jan. 6 defendants without details
shortDescription: President-elect Trump vowed to pardon Jan. 6 defendants, sparking anticipation among potential recipients while critics warned of 'terrible mistake.'

title: How Mike Johnson’s alliance with Trump shapes GOP power
shortDescription: The alliance between Speaker Mike Johnson and President-elect Donald Trump may prove to be the most important relationship in Washington.

shortDescription: Donald Trump's inauguration has been moved inside due to cold temperatures. Here's a look back at how the weather has fared for past inaugurations?
